channel.title: 562 help
channel.description:
Hi i have been coding my 562 server and I'm having trouble finding things these are the things i need help with if anyone can help it will be greatly appreciated
1.changing the teleports in magic tab(idk where it is) 2.changing the text in quest tab(idk where it is) 3.how to use the same npc or object for two different shops or something. 4.how to get rid of objects, such as doors and walls and stuff. 5.how to add a bank npc so people can access their bank if anyone can help me with these things please do
I'm pretty new to coding servers i have figured out everything else by either searching for it or from learning by looking at the code. These are the things i cant find
thank you.
